title: State v. Pamela Lanier – Addendum 1 – Inland Empire
content:encoded:
April 26, 2018 / Rabia and Colin talk about Episode 1 of the Pamela Lanier series as well as the podcast "Empire on Blood" with guest Steve Fishman.

Episode scoring music by Animal Weapon and Blue Dot Sessions.

Today’s Addendum is sponsored by The Economist and Squarespace.
